ThingDef.label: eltex bracelet
ThingDef.description: A beautiful bracelet made from metal and a priceless gem. It improves the wearer's social skill and beauty. Its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate psychic entropy.

ThingDef.label: eltex necklace
ThingDef.description: A beautiful necklace made from metal and a priceless gem. It improves the wearer's social skill and beauty. This particular necklace is for psychic focusing. While it provides little physical protection, its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate psychic entropy.

ThingDef.label: eltex ring
ThingDef.description: A beautiful ring made from metal and a priceless gem. It improves the wearer's social impact. This particular ring is for psychic focusing. Its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate psychic entropy.

ThingDef.label: eltex earring
ThingDef.description: A beautiful pair of earrings made from metal and a priceless gem. It improves the wearer's social skill, trade skill and beauty. Its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate psychic entropy.
